Branching Fraction Predictions
Branching Fraction Predictions

• Primarily calculated in potential models – Often neglecting relativistic corrections – Including relativistic corrections plagued with technical ambiguities
• Primarily calculated in potential models
– Often neglecting relativistic corrections
– Including relativistic corrections plagued with technical ambiguities

• Range of theoretical predictions: – (1-15)x10-4 for Υ(2S) → b – (1-20)x10-4 for Υ(3S) → b
